role.descr: entity created //transcription or translation or process//
specific location of tissue or cell //mostly saying about exon or intron//

example.text: Polymerases that initiate transcription with RSF can only extend their transcripts in the presence of FACT (facilitates chromatin transcription).
example.arg: in the presence of FACT (facilitates chromatin transcription)

example.text: The repression is initiated by autophosphorylation of the sensor protein ArcB, followed by phosphoryl group transfer to the regulator ArcA.
example.arg: autophosphorylation of the sensor protein ArcB

example.text: Transcription of ptsG encoding glucose-specific permease, enzyme IICB (Glc), in Escherichia coli is initiated from two promoters, P1 and P2.
example.arg: Transcription of ptsG encoding glucose-specific permease
from two promoters, P1 and P2

example.text: Transcription of the divergently transcribed glpTQ and glpACB operons is initiated at sites separated by 132 base pairs (bp) of DNA.
example.arg: Transcription of the divergently transcribed glpTQ and glpACB operons
at sites separated by 132 base pairs (bp) of DNA

example.text: Transcription was initiated from a sigma (70)-dependent promoter at the G residue of the upstream GATC sequence.
